description:
In magical valley the fruits is ripe. Citizens of the valley decided to find the most capable of them to harvest the fruits. And they make the contest - who will gather fruits in 6 seconds, will be the honored fruit farmer! Jump over the obstacles, don't fall on spikes, and most important - don't stop, or the flame will burn you.

Complete as many levels as you can and harvest tons of fruits to unlock new skins and gain additional lives what helps you finish the game.

Features:
- Unlimited arcade game focusing on setting the record.
- 50 unique levels (which change randomly)
- Simple control.
- Dynamic old-school gameplay.
- Beautiful pixel graphics and cool music.
- 6 seconds timer on all levels.
- Harvest fruits to unblock new skins and additional lives.
- Lots of achievements.
